title: Can anyone ID this font?
content:
Any clue as to what this font is?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080613052720im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/homemade_6381.jpg)

 [‹ BREATHLESS](http://web.archive.org/web/20080613052720/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46229 "Go to previous forum topic") [Any ideas on this one? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080613052720/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46237 "Go to next forum topic")
author: spidersnakewars

comments.content: I’ve got it as Opti Original Script
Thanks Lex, I was fairly sure it was a copy of something
Thank you all for your help.
